name: Everything is money!
description:
A top down shooter where everything is money - be it life, ammo, or skills, it's all the same!

Shoot the piggie backs with coins to destroy them!

Increase your skills by shooting coins at them!

Keep going as long as you can!

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left click

Made in less than 3 days for Ludum Dare 44.

This game is still in development, you can follow me so you don't miss any cool updates!

Warning! Linux and macOS builds are completely untested!
